tasks.title: Project Initiation
tasks.description: Kickstart the project, define objectives, and allocate resources.

tasks.title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
tasks.description: Collect and analyze requirements for the mobile calculator app.

tasks.title: Android App Development
tasks.description: Develop the Android version of the Calculator+ app.

tasks.title: iOS App Development
tasks.description: Develop the iOS version of the Calculator+ app.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Thoroughly test the app, including unit, integration, and user acceptance testing.

tasks.title: User Documentation
tasks.description: Create user documentation and help files for the app.

tasks.title: App Deployment
tasks.description: Prepare the app for deployment on Android and iOS platforms.

tasks.title: Project Closure and Reporting
tasks.description: Wrap up the project and create closure reports.
